pilots.name: Ben Teene
pilots.caption: Crimson Bolide
pilots.ability: After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc], assign the Rattled, condition to the defender.

pilots.name: Cat
pilots.caption: Cobalt Wasp
pilots.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is at range 0-1 of at least 1 friendly device, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Cobalt Squadron Bomber
pilots.text: Whether the ordinance silos of their Starfortresses are loaded with proton bombs or relief supplies, the heroic crews of Cobalt Squadron dedicate their lives to making a difference in the galaxy.

pilots.name: Edon Kappehl
pilots.caption: Crimson Hailstorm
pilots.ability: After you fully execute a blue or white maneuver, if you have not dropped or launched a device this round, you may drop 1 device.

pilots.name: Finch Dallow
pilots.caption: Cobalt Hammer
pilots.ability: Before you would drop a bomb, you may place it in the play area touching you instead.

pilots.name: Vennie
pilots.caption: Crimson Cutter
pilots.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is in a friendly ship's [Single Turret Arc], you may add 1 [Focus] result to your roll.
